tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE child_custody_cases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  child_name VARCHAR,
  parent1_name VARCHAR,
  parent2_name VARCHAR,
  custody_status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE child_custody_cases (
    case_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    child_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    custodial_parent TEXT,
    social_worker TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE family_dynamics (
    family_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    parent1_name TEXT,
    parent2_name TEXT,
    children_count INT,
    income_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    housing_type TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE child_care_cases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  child_name VARCHAR(50),
  case_status VARCHAR(20),
  case_summary TEXT,
  date_opened TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE family_members (
  member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  family_id INT,
  member_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  relationship VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE case_notes (
  note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  note_text TEXT,
  author VARCHAR(50),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ChildCases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    child_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    guardian_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    case_status TEXT,
    case_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE FamilyMembers (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    family_id INT NOT NULL,
    member_name TEXT,
    age INT,
    relationship TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CaseHistory (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE,
    event_description TEXT,
    outcome TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE FamilyDynamics (
    family_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    family_name TEXT,
    total_members INT,
    address TEXT,
    city TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE custody_case (
  case_id UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  child_id UUID NOT NULL,
  parent_id UUID NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE assessment (
  assessment_id UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id UUID NOT NULL,
  worker_id UUID NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  result VARCHAR(255)
);
